name: datwitchcharades
description: Fun litte Web App for streamers to play charades with their chat!

scripts.sass:index: sass index.scss index.css && npx postcss index.css --use autoprefixer -d ./
scripts.sass:popout: sass popout_word.scss popout_word.css && npx postcss popout_word.css --use autoprefixer -d ./
scripts.build:popout: npm run sass:popout && npm run uglify:tpopout
scripts.build:index: npm run sass:index && npm run uglify:tcat && npm run uglify:tcg
scripts.build: npm run sass:index && npm run sass:popout && npm run uglify:tcat && npm run uglify:tcg && npm run uglify:tpopout && npm run copy:purify

author: lejara
